𓋴 𓅱 𓏏 𓅱 𓏏 𓂻 | forth | soweit sodann

root ܚ-ܘ-ܛ‎ (ḥ-w-ṭ) related to sewing.
Compare Arabic خَيَّاطَة ḵayyāṭa and Hebrew חַיָּטָה ħayyāṭâ

Arabic has the most unusual form with حِنْطَة ḥinṭa, “wheat” <<< ⇔ schwind winter ⇔ Schnitt above

קֶמַח (kémakh) flour (ground cereal grains) קַמְחָא qamḥā “flour” and Arabic قَمْح qamḥ, “wheat”
